leftColumn.title: Advancing Geoscience
leftColumn.description: IEEE India Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium (InGARSS 2026) is a premier GRSS, India flagship event bringing together experts, researchers, engineers, and industry leaders to explore the intersection of Geoscience, Space, Satellite, Remote Sensing and Artificial Intelligence (AI) and the rapidly evolving field of similar domains.

rightColumn.heading: Our Goals
rightColumn.description: To provide unique platform for showcasing cutting-edge research, fostering interdisciplinary collaborations, and discussing future directions in geospatial and remote sensing science. It aims to advance these fields and promote sustainable and ethical AI/ML practices in the geoscience domain by bringing together researchers, practitioners, and policymakers.

venue.label: HOST LOCATION
venue.description: Experience the symposium in India's "Cyber City". Hyderabad perfectly blends 400 years of history with a booming aerospace and IT sector, providing an inspiring backdrop for InGARSS 2026.

invitation.title: Invitation to Participate
paragraphs: We are delighted to invite you to the 2026 IEEE India Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium (InGARSS), hosted in the vibrant "Cyber City" of Hyderabad, India.

As a distinguished expert in the field, your insights and contributions are invaluable to the success of our symposium. The 2026 theme, "Digital Earth: Modeling, Mapping, and Monitoring", reflects our commitment to leveraging geospatial technologies.
InGARSS 2026 offers a dynamic platform to share your recent work, engage in panel discussions, and network with professionals from ISRO and NASA.
We look forward to your positive response and the privilege of welcoming you to Hyderabad.
